@graph.title: Decentralized computing using blockchain technologies and smart contracts : emerging research and opportunities
@graph.abstract: "[This book] is a concise and informative source of academic research on the latest developments in blockchain innovations and their application in contractual agreements. Highlighting pivotal discussions on topics such as cryptography, programming techniques, and decentralized computing, this book is an ideal publication for researchers, academics, professionals, students, and practitioners seeking content on utilizing block chains with smart contracts"--Provided by publisher.
